title: Secret Method To Seeing Other Book’s Keywords
description:
Wouldn’t it be nice to know which keywords your competitors' books are ranking for?  Which phrases have best helped similar books like yours rank, and thus get more customers and more sales? Well, now you can!  

Watch this video, to find out how you can now search for a competitor's ASIN number and see exactly what keyword phrases that book has ranked for.  Furthermore, you can look to see how many searches that book got and other key information. Building the perfect 7 Kindle Keywords for your own book. 

Check out how to use Publisher Rocket's Reverse ASIN Feature here: https://kindlepreneur.com/reverse-asin-keyword-lookup/

If you haven't already, make sure to subscribe to @Kindlepreneur to ensure that you are the first to know when something new changes! 


WANT TO SELL YOUR BOOKS LIKE A PRO:
http://Kindlepreneur.com

GET MY FREE BOOK ON INCREASING YOUR EBOOK'S RANKINGS ON AMAZON
http://kindlepreneur.com/amazon-kindle-rankings-2/
